title: Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: During project creation, there is no confirmation message or prompt to confirm the ability to scrub the bin directory.
EB: During project creation, there should be a confirmation message or prompt to confirm the ability to scrub the bin directory.
SR:
1. Open the project creation page.
2. Fill in the necessary details.
3. Click on the 'Create' button.
4. Verify if there is a confirmation message or prompt to confirm the ability to scrub the bin directory.
